en.hero_text: Stop stacking extra Discord bots. The Bros24 Whiteout Survival bot unites Events, Boosts, Heroes, Calculators, Welcome & Ranking in one multilingual assistant â€” built by players for players.
en.hero_badge: By players, for players â€” Whiteout Survival
en.usp1_text: Event Center, Boost tracking, Hero Hub, Calculators, Welcome & Ranking â€” everything in one bot.
en.usp2_text: Less setup, less clutter. One clean, modern menu flow for everyone.
en.usp3_text: You shape the bot with your requests. Community feedback ships weekly.
en.features_sub: Everything your alliance needs â€” in one place.
en.feature_event_text: Create reminders (title, message, images, thumbnails, custom footer). Schedules: daily / 48h / weekly / bi-weekly / every 4 weeks / custom. Target channels, @everyone, roles or members. Edit & delete via menu.
en.feature_hero_text: Hero details, skills, tier lists, building strategies and advanced mechanics.
en.feature_calc_text: Furnace & resource planning, chief gear & charm math, island guide, ranking & welcome, plus minigames.
en.coming_text: New features for Bros24 are on the way â€” crafted for alliances, smarter coordination and more fun in Whiteout Survival. Got ideas? Tell us!

en.menu_update_b2: Multilingual (EN, DE, FR, IT, PL, TH).

en.lang_update_b1: Fixed: language picker opening/visibility issue. Menu is now visible for everyone and opens reliably. Translations apply site-wide and persist across reloads.
en.support_highlight_text: Bros24 stays free for everyone. If youâ€™d like to help with server costs & weekly development, you can support via Frost Stars in Whiteout Survival â€” totally optional, no pressure.
en.community_title: Join the â„ Whiteout Survival | DOA 214 Community
en.community_sub: Events, guides, alliance tools & more â€” be part of it.
en.community_p1: Do you play Whiteout Survival and want to get betterâ€”faster? Ever wondered how top states plan Bear Trap ğŸ», perfect Frostfire Mine â„ï¸ğŸ”¥ rotations, or squeeze every drop from SVS âš”ï¸? Youâ€™re in the right place.
en.community_p2: Weâ€™re DOAâ€™s community from State 214, but our doors are open to every state and every alliance. Join for teamwork, practical guides, and quick help from daily playersâ€”beginners to min-max pros.
en.community_p3: New to the game? Weâ€™ll walk you through the first days and weeks: what to build first, how to pace research, which heroes and pets to focus, daily routines, and best F2P value.
en.community_p4: Already experienced? Dive into meta chats, tested comps, damage math, spreadsheets, and high-level planning for Castles/Strongholds ğŸ°, Frost Dragon Tyrant ğŸ‰, and cross-state coordination.
en.community_p5: Never miss rewards again. Our custom bots run smart timers, rally planners, and reminders so your alliance stays organized without spam. Opt in for what you want, mute what you donâ€™t.
en.community_p6: Communication is effortless with dedicated language channels. ğŸŒ English â€¢ Deutsch â€¢ Polski â€¢ FranÃ§ais â€¢ Italiano â€¢ à¹„à¸—à¸¢ â€¦ and more on request.
en.community_p7: Leaders and guide creators are welcome. Share strategies, coordinate cross-state projects, recruit respectfully, and build healthier alliances. No account selling/trading.
en.community_p8: Jump in, say hello in #arrival, tell us your state and language, and weâ€™ll unlock the right channels. If you like the vibe, please â­ vote on top.gg and invite your friends.
